name: Fragment Mono SC
description: Fragment Mono is a monospaced coding version of Helvetica created by modifying and extending Nimbus Sans by URW Design Studio. Fragment Mono is designed by Wei Huang based on Nimbus Sans by URW Design Studio, based on Helvetica by Max Miedinger. Fragment Mono SC is the Small Caps version of Fragment Mono . To contribute, see github.com/weiweihuanghuang/fragment-mono/
author: Wei Huang, URW Design Studio
